title: Restaurant website
description: Created a dynamic restaurant website with React and Node.js. Features include browsing menus, making reservations, and online ordering with secure payment processing and real-time updates.

title: Clone
description: Popular website clones featuring a user-friendly interface and seamless functionality. Includes core features, responsive design, and secure backend integration to replicate the original site's experience.

title: Art Gallery
description: Developed an engaging art gallery website featuring artist profiles It includes high-resolution images, virtual tours,shopping, and interactive exhibition schedules for enhanced user experience.

title: Saree Store
description: Designed and developed a stylish e-commerce website for saree shopping using Laravel. The platform features product filtering, secure checkout, detailed product views, and an intuitive admin panel for managing inventory and orders.

title: Library Management System
description: Built a C++ console-based Library Management System with book inventory, student registration, issuance/returns, file-based data storage, and user-friendly interface.
